info.name: Syosetu - Minimalist
info.description:
- Maintains current web design, but maximizes reading area and removes/hides unnecessary elements.
- Can also be used when browsing Syosetu through Google Translate.
- Day and Night modes added. 
  Requires some copy + pasting inside the script though. 
  Replace the block of code under "Color scheme".
info.additionalInfo:
16/11/2018 - Minor changes
12/03/2019 - Rewrite, Google Translate elements updated and moved into their own separate scripts
